reasoning: Type 1 (non-neuronopathic) Gaucher disease incidence estimated at ~1 per 40,000 to 1 per 100,000 globally (1.5 per 100,000 average). Population-based variation significant: higher in Ashkenazi Jewish populations (~1 per 40,000 = 2.5 per 100k), lower in other European (~1 per 100,000) and Asian populations.
source: National Organization for Rare Disorders (NORD) Gaucher Disease summary; Orphanet Gaucher Disease epidemiology estimates
